title: Shark Ships
description: Craze of death races has peaked the highest of all time. You being an skillful helmsman is known for your wittiness and deception. Now go out there and give these kids a lesson of survival out there. Fun racing adventure game, where you have to get your favorite ship, and beat the other ships till death or get destroyed by your competitors. Circuit Race with unique power ups, and you will have to figure out each power up purpose, before you can crown the race.
instructions: Unique power ups, each power up has it purpose, you have to figure them out, from Locking Missile to Track Aware missiles. Feel free to type your findings in comments and start a fun debate.

title: Bouncy Race 3D
description: It's time to Race and Bounce! In Bouncy Race 3D the player takes on 15 players in a highly competitive run to the finish line. Dodge the moving objects and other hurdles on the track and make sure to collect the power up to gain extra speed. To finish on the podium and progress further in the game, it's key to bounce off the trampolines. The high jumps will allow you to skip part of track. If you manage to land on the track again - that is.
instructions: Use your mouse, arrow keys or swipe to move your character left/right. When in a jump, use the same left/right movement to position the landing marker and land your character back on the track.

title: Super Spy Agent 46
description: We all known, agent 47, but the figure agent 46 had been more popular in alter verse, more deadly, more louder and definitely more then just a beast when it comes to taking the hordes of enemies 46 is a paid assassin and a clone. He gets his name from being the 46th clone created from the DNA of five different men, made to be perfect spies who could easily maintain peak physicality and intelligence for many years while easily being controlled by whoever they were devoted to, usually a handler.
instructions: Keyboard Control: Action:WASD/Arrows Move Mouse Aim Space/J Jump or ascend or drift LMB/Z Fire RMB/X Grenade or descend MouseWheel/Q/E Change weapon A Jump / ascend / drift Right Trigger/Shoulder/X Fire Left Trigger/Shoulder/B Grenade or descend Left/Right Change weapon Left Shift Button Activate Slo-Mo Time Y Enter/Exit

title: Beach Connect Mahjong
description: Welcome to Beach Connect Mahjong, a captivating linking game! Your mission is to match two identical blocks, but there's a twist – the connecting line between two matching blocks can have only two turns. Explore this unique take on the classic board game as you make connections between matching tiles while racing against the clock. Can you clear the board before time runs out? Dive in and give it your best shot!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Tropical Merge
description: Welcome to Tropical Merge! Prepare yourself for the family farm adventure full of mysteries and extraordinary characters. Help locals save their paradise bay while renovating the island and growing your tropical farm. Go on expeditions to explore other islands and solve even more riddles. Don’t miss your chance to build perfect tropical farm!
instructions: Match and merge objects to create new ones and renovate the island!

title: Ace Brawl Battle 3D
description: It is not impossible that one of the ways to make the world a more peaceful place is to virtualize the battlefield. It is in this vein that this game comes into being which is to provide a virtual public space for people to fight to their heart's content, with the help of highly advanced weapons and other powerful pieces of military equipments.
instructions: Click or tap to control

title: Squid Squad Mission Revenge
description: One of the survivors of these squid games returns to take revenge on these crazy games and decided to eliminate all the hooded men and the bosses that still continue to organize these crazy games. Your mission is to control the little hero so that he can eliminate all the enemies in each of the levels !! So help the little character by pointing and shooting. Take care of your ammunition. You have a limit in each level. Try not to waste your bullets.
instructions: Instructions: Point and shoot with the mouse Touch the screen on mobile devices.

title: Gladiator True Story
description: You are Bruticus, destroyer of worlds. This is the story of how you became the greatest GLADIATOR of all time. Based on historical facts. Hack n' slash your way through waves of ultimate fighters and champions. Level up your armor and weapons to do even more damage in this bloody battle ARENA!
instructions: [WASD]/[ARROWKEYS] - Move [Z]/[LMB] - Attack (hold for charged attack) [X]/[RMB] - Defend (hold for charged attack)

title: The Celebrity Way of life
description: Ever wanted to be a celebrity? Now you have the chance in this cool new game called "The Celebrity Way of Life"! Dress-up for every occasion and become the best-dressed celeb!
instructions: Use your left mouse button to play the game.

title: Year Round Fashionista Curly
description: Join Moana in a year round adventure by playing this fabulous fashion game called Year Round Fashionista: Moana! Beautiful Moana wants to stay fashionable all year long and fortunately she has the perfect wardrobe to accomplish that. She has items fit for all of the months and seasons of the year and she would like you to help her create the most fashionable outfits with them. Take a fashion trip through the year and create a pastel look for May, a neon one for hot August days and stay comfy for chilly autumn nights. Your imagination is the only limit in this game so go ahead and have a blast playing Year Round Fashionista: Moana!
instructions: Use your left mouse button to play the game.

title: Curvy Road
description: Control the ball along the winding road in a 3d environment. Don't fall into the abyss. Simple and intuitive controls with challenging high score based gameplay.
instructions: Navigate the ball along the curvy road

title: Numbers Bricks
description: In the meticulously set endless level mode, players need to find the right direction and launch small balls to smash bricks. An easy-to-use operating mode. The more bricks you smash at a time, the higher the score. Come and try it together!
instructions: Click or tap drag screen to aim and release to shoot.

title: Santa Haircut
description: Santa is getting ready for the Christmas night. So he went to your salon to get a makeover. Let's help him cut out his messy hair and give the best hair makeover he can get! You can dress him up at the end to perfect his new look!
instructions: Use MOUSE to play game.

title: Winter Mahjong
description: Winter Mahjong is a fun and exciting game of Mahjong with mistletoes and christmas presents! Use your skills, strategy and luck to complete the game! There are some handy features to help you complete the full game.
instructions: Click on the Mahjong tiles to make connections and clean out the table!

title: Drunken Spin Punch
description: The new challenge of Drunken Stickmans, spinning punches begins! Swing your fists and try to stay balanced and don't forget to control your energy! Drunken Spin Punch game has 1P and 2P modes. You can play the game from both PC and mobile devices. The first to reach a score of 5 in the game wins the match!
instructions: PLAYER 1: "ARROW KEYS" PLAYER 2: "W,A,S,D" You can use the left and right sides on touch screens.

title: Magical Fairy Fashion Look
description: Welcome to the Magical Fairy Fashion Look. Skyler and Sunny love things about fairies. Fairies always look pretty, with wings and magical powers. They love to look like them. But they have a dilemma to choosing perfect costumes. Help them to pick a cute outfit, pretty accessories, and wings. Play and have fun with our cute games.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: 123 game
description: 123 The 123 game is a game designed for children to learn numbers in a fun way with references on the fingers of their hands from their mobile phone, tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids
instructions: Click on the correct answer.

title: Amogus.io
description: General Among Us has sent you to capture the YRZ-15 space station. Fight other impostors for the territory. Don't let the enemies of the Amogus defeat you! Capture territory, guard your borders and occupy the entire station area! When impostor is running out of its territory, it is vulnerable and leaves a trail. If you hit the trail, it will die, and its territory will be freed. Keep your trail safe and attack enemy trails. Conquer the largest territory in the station and get the crown!
instructions: Touch screen on mobile device to control your character movement. For desktop use mouse or keyboard (WASD / arrow keys).

title: Who was who
description: Your task is to match the photos of a celebrity in his youth. This exciting game is not only for those who know celebrities, but also for those who want to try themselves as an expert in face recognition.
instructions: You need to connect a child photo of a celebrity with the corresponding photo with a line

title: Real Shooting Fps Strike
description:
Real Shooting Fps Strike is a number 1 3d fps offline shooting and sniper game. Real Shooting Fps Strike is designed for FPS fans. Join the battle and destroy all enemies as a commando to save the world. Real Shooting Fps Strike is free to play, and it is one of the best shooting games. New 30 different maps, new weapons, new game modes are waiting for you in this incredible action game, where you and terrorists are going to engage in the battle. If you have a craze for playing terrorist shooting games, you will enjoy the arena of new and terrorist war games in this free Real Shooting Fps Strike. Play this fantastic new fps shooting game to show your target shooting skills. Aim to shoot with heavy & auxiliary weapons as a first-person perspective shooter in Real Shooting Fps Strike. You can download this strike gun game for free and play it whenever you are bored, as it is an offline gun game.

Gameplay and missions:

In this shooting fps game, you need to pass each level to go to the next one. Real shooting Fps strike is a mission game; you will have to kill all the enemies in the mission to go onto the next stage, you will be rewarded with money after each level. With this reward, you can buy and upgrade your guns and make yourself strong. It is a pistol game, so you can move around the free map and kill enemies with your arsenal; you can crouch and proceed with the spindle to dodge enemy bullets and kill them. After every mission, you will get money for new weapons, and you will be automatically sent to the next level. In this game, you need to pass all the levels to end the storyline; it's a first-person perspective (FPP) game with Real HD visuals and superb audio quality. The essence of a real shooting game is present in the Real Shooting Fps strike game. Move around the level map, kill the enemies, purchase and upgrade your new weapons to complete challenging missions. Killing enemies will get you money in the game; headshots get you extra money after completing the mission. This new game will challenge you with several new objectives, and you will have to eliminate all of the opponents to advance to the next round. This game gives you 30 new missions; missions become more complicated once you eliminate all opponents in the first 5-6 missions. When you initially start the game, you'll be eager to kill all enemies and acquire all of the weapons to become invincible.

Weapons:

After you have killed enemies and earned rewards, you can buy new weapons. For this, you need to go to the weapon store and purchase any gun you like. Real Shooting Fps strike lets you buy guns such as AK-47, Shotgun, MP5, etc. Every weapon has its price; its price depends on its abilities such as good firing rate, excellent handling, and accuracy.

Settings:

Real shooting Fps strike has a setting interface in the game to control Music volume, Sound volume, sensitivity of the screen, and it provides an option of auto-shoot. This option will help you kill enemies without even pressing the fire button; as the enemies get closer, your equipped gun will fire and kill the enemies in the mission. If you enjoy playing first-person fighting and shooting games, counter-terrorist games! Then don't waste any time and play this new fps encounter shooting game. If you're looking for the finest free sniper 3d game, then a Real shooting Fps strike is undoubtedly for you to battle with opponents in terrorist shooting games to receive the maximum action in free shooting games or fps shooting games. This action game will give you a variety of realistic 3D locations to provide you with hours of fun.
instructions: Movement - WASD, fire - left mouse, zoom - right mouse, jump - space, lock cursor - L, Crouch - C, Reload - R

title: Solitaire Story TriPeaks
description: Solitaire Story - the famous messenger game is now also available here! Play your favorite card game and explore distant countries, fantastic landscapes, and famous landmarks. You have to draw cards one at a time from your stockpile. Select the cards that are one higher or one lower in value to your drawn card to remove it from the playing field. To complete a level you need to remove all the cards from the playing field without running out of cards from your stockpile. Complete the daily missions and events to unlock new deck designs and prizes that help you solve those tricky levels. Play Solitaire Story now for free and join the thousands of Friends of Solitaire!
instructions: Pick a card with one value higher or lower than the one on your deck to remove them from the board. Complete the objective to pass a level.

title: Ellie Get Ready with Me
description: Play this amazing game named Barbie Get Ready With Me and learn this fashionista's secrets to a flawless look each day! Barbie has a very popular vlog channel and all her viewers are wondering how does she achieve her gorgeous look so soon after she wakes up. So she has decided to do a Get Ready With Me video and take the fans through all the steps. Have a lot of fun playing Barbie Get Ready With Me!
instructions: Use your left mouse button to play the game.

title: ABC game
description: ABC game ABC game is a game developed for children where they teach different words with the help of images from the cell phone, tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids
instructions: Click on the correct answer.

title: Solitaire Story Tripeaks 2
description: Solitaire Story - Tripeaks 2 is the latest and greatest Solitaire game for you! Solving puzzles and traveling the world means endless hours of fun! Sit back and relax as you shuffle the cards and collect stars through the challenging levels of this game. Select the cards with one value higher or lower than the card you have on your deck to remove them from the board. If you can't find a suitable card for the one on your deck, then pick another one from your deck. You start with 5 lives and lose one life after reaching the end of your deck. Clear 5 cards in a row to earn extra free cards for your deck. Collect bonus items and unlock different areas, card collections, and more!
instructions: Pick a card with one value higher or lower than the one on your deck to remove them from the board. Complete the objective to pass a level.

title: Drunken Slap Wars
description: The fun Drunk stickman games continue with Slap Wars. The aim of the game is to beat the opponents with balanced slaps. Try to stop the slap power bar in the green area. In this way, your slaps will be effective. The opponents will get harder each round and the bar will speed up! Drunken Slap Wars game can be played by 1 or 2 Player. Let the fun matchups begin!
instructions: "W" and "UP ARROW" or Touch Controls.

title: Quizzing Measurement
description: Welcome to the Quizzing Measurement Game! Test your measurement skills by answering intriguing questions. You'll be presented with four options for each question. Getting the correct answer on your first attempt will earn you a higher score. Aim to achieve the highest score possible and challenge your friends to see if they can beat your score. Are you up for the measurement challenge? Let's find out!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Captain Sniper
description: You are a superhero detective, and it is your duty to protect civilians. On this day, you received an order that a group of terrorist organizations plan to attack civilians. As a sniper, you must complete these orders. Conspiracy to defeat the terrorist organization! Take your beloved sniper rifle and go out!
instructions: Use the mouse to control the front sight and snipe the enemy

title: Squid Game Jigsaw
description: Squid Game Jigsaw is a fun online puzzle game. Drag the pieces into right position using mouse. Solving puzzles is relaxing, rewarding, and keeps your brain sharp. You need to spend $1000 to be able to purchase one of the following pictures. You have three modes for each picture from which the hardest mode brings more money. You have a total of 10 pictures.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Muscle Race 3D
description: How to overpass the track which is full of walls and swimming pools? You need to collect dumbbells and be stronger enough to overpass these obstacles at each level in an arcade game called Muscle Race 3D! Try to collect dumbbells as fast as you can to beat the other three AI players!
instructions: Slide to play.

title: ABC ANIMAL
description: ABC ANIMAL Abc animal game is a game developed for children with the objective of teaching in a fun way the names of animals from the mobile phone, tablet or computer. Game developed by: Nau.kids
instructions: Drag the correct option to its place.

title: Hydro Storm 2
description: Somewhere, on the treacherous waves of tomorrow, where law is non-existent, and lady justice has packed her bags... Xform Games presents Hydro Storm 2. The most post apocalyptic jetski racer from the future.
instructions: [WASD]/[ARROWKEYS] - Steer [Z]/[LMB] - Primary weapon [X]/[RMB] - Secondary weapon [ESC]/[P] - Pause game [M] - Mute sound

title: BFFS Night Out
description: Have a fun night out with the princesses in this cool new game called "BFFs Night Out"! Help them pick the best oufits and put on their best make up!
instructions: Use your left mouse button to play the game.

title: Fire vs Water Fights
description: Fire vs Water Fights is a fun and full of effects action game. Send quick punches to your opponent with your glow-effect fighter and don't waste your Super Punch when it's ready! Whether you choose a fire or a water fighter, the important thing is to win 2 rounds in a row. Fire vs Water Fights game has 1P and 2P modes. Let the fight begin!
instructions: PLAYER 1 MOVE: "A,D" PUNCHES: "W,S" SUPER PUNCH: "G" PLAYER 2 MOVE: "LEFT-RIGHT ARROWS" PUNCHES: "UP-DOWN ARROWS" SUPER PUNCH: "P"

title: Giant Snowball Rush
description: Push a snowball for a racing, and finally reach the finish line with larger and larger snowballs. In the process, players need to flexibly avoid various obstacles and collect gold coins and props as much as possible. When you keep pushing the snowball, the snowball will roll bigger and bigger. The disadvantage of the big snowball is that it is more difficult to control.
instructions: Tap and hold to move.

title: Funny Daycare
description: Funny Daycare is a fun loving game to play with various cute animal characters in daycare center. You'll become a babysitter and take care of them. This game provides some creative task like bathe the babies, play with them, prepare delicious meals, and dress up. Let your imagination fly exploring and playing with Funny Daycare!
instructions: Use MOUSE to the play game.

title: Emoji Match 3
description: Play Emoji Match 3 online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Hex Takeover
description: Play Hex Takeover online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Ellie Fashion Police
description: Barbie is on the case in this new dressup game called Barbie Fashion Police! Help her spot the badly dressed princesses and give them a total makeover. Pick cute outfits for them and have fun in this cool new dressup game!
instructions: Use your left mouse button to play the game.

title: Stervella in the Fashion World
description: Estelle loves fashion since childhood. But daring and unusual fashion! The girl mixes incompatible styles and blows the brain with her ideas. She decided to break through to the very top of the fashion scene and become a famous fashion designer, and even took a pseudonym for herself - Stervella. Let's help Stervella dazzle the audience with incredible outfits and accessories and become the greatest fashion designer ever!
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.

title: Fun Draw Race 3D
description: Draw on the screen to create the suitable legs for your robot and try to be the winner each race. The Differen track course has the different obstacles. Draw unique shapes for each challenge you face in the race. In the process of running, you can modify and optimize legs at any time.
instructions: Slide to draw.

title: Battle Soccer Arena
description: Enter the green battlefield in this amazing version of the beautiful football game. Play with your friends or against the CPU in a three on three football game between nations of your choice. Neither side has a goalkeeper, so adjust your playing style accordingly and enjoy!
instructions: SPACE BAR to kick / slide ARROWS to move

title: MathPup Story
description: MathPup is through with math for the day and is off looking for dog bones. Help MathPup get the dog bone in each level in this platform puzzle game by having MathPup Strategically push and pull boxes so that MathPup can safely get to the dog bone's location.
instructions: Keyboard Controls: WASD keys to move MathPup. Arrow keys to move boxes when they are horizontal or vertical to MathPup. Touch Controls: Use the on-screen arrow keys to move either the boxes or MathPup. Switch between box and MathPup control by touching the icon shown between the 4 arrows. Boxes can only be moved when they are horizontal or vertical to MathPup.

title: Dino Squad Battle Mission
description: As human beings so often fight with one another, dinosaurs are belligerent creatures too. In this game, you are somehow involved in a mission to break out of the siege formed by a death squad of other dinosaurs. Are you ready to confront those hostile congeners?
instructions: WASD and click to control

title: Kick Colored Balls
description: The goal at this game is to kick colored balls. On both sides of the game area will be balls. On the left side will be the yellow ball and on the right the blue one. Tap on left or right side and the balls will hit. In the middle of the screen will move balls in line in yellow and blue color only. With the balls that are on the side you have to destroy the coming balls. But the yellow ball will destroy the yellow ball only and the blue ball the blue one. If you mix the blows you will lose.
instructions: Tap on screen to play.

title: Operation Desert Road
description: The desert roads are packed with enemies. Who will we call upon? That is right,.. YOU. We want you! Help us to clear the Desert Roads of all enemies! Fight your way across the desert in different vehicles using all kinds of special attacks! Each vehicle has its pros and cons. Can you finish it?
instructions: [WASD]/[ARROWKEYS][SWIPE] - Move [Z][LMB][TAP] - Shoot [X][RMB][Button] - Activate Special

title: TRZ Battleship
description: Traditional turn-based naval battle game! You must attack the opponent's spaces trying to find the position of all your ships. But don't hesitate, your opponent will also attack you. The one who completely destroys all occupied spaces of the opponent will win the battle!
instructions: Touch in th enemy grid to shoot.

title: Mahjong Around The World Africa
description: Our mahjong journey will start on the African continent. Find all mahjong pairs to clear the game field and set free all 10 African animals. Mind that there is a time limit for each level. You can also use prompts, and swap tiles.
instructions: Make Mahjong matches complete all the levels and free animals!

title: Personal Computer
description: Get a personal computer in your hands and earn a lot of money! Do freelance tasks correctly and develop your computer skills. Many different levels are waiting for you.
instructions: Perform tasks given by the customer on the computer, and get paid for it. Use your mouse and keyboard.

title: Arctic jump
description: Try one of the best funniest jumping game! Climb as high as you can! Jump to stack blocks, and take your favorite character to the sky! Complete the challenges to unlock 5 bonus animals!
instructions: Use space button or mouse click to jump.

title: Incredible Princess Eye Art 2
description: Welcome to an incredible tutorial from a fabulous makeup artist. Try your hand at makeup on the beautiful eyes of cute princesses. Use extraordinary artistic solutions to create a striking and non-standard look. Use new trends: angel makeup, rhinestones, animal prints, neon effects. Grab your makeup brush and get started! Try out new art options for the eyes.
instructions: Left mouse button or touch.
